\SetAPI{J-C}
\section{ambeth.ioc.debug.active}
\label{configuration:AmbethIocDebugActive}
\ClearAPI
Allows to run the IoC container in debug mode. This e.g. disables several security behaviors to ease debugging. Valid values are "true" and "false".
